a1: Yes, click the Print button to open your browser's print dialog. You can print directly or save as PDF.
q2: Can I customize the store information?
a2: Yes, you can set the store name, address, receipt number, and date.
a3: Cash, Card, and Bank Transfer are available as payment method options.
a4: Yes, you can set a tax rate percentage that will be calculated and displayed on the receipt.
